Posts.Content: Oct 8, 2007 09:22PM Pamnsons wrote: I also had an ultra sound guided biopsy about 10 days ago - well an attempted one.  It was too deep and they couldn't get a clear picture.  This morning I had my biospy with an MRI.  I'm feeling a little pain now, but the actual proceedure wasn't bad.  They put ace bandages around my chest, because I was having some bleeding.  But it appears to be OK now.  I so can't wait for this all to be over.  I've had mamograms, ultra sounds, ductograms, MRI, and now the biopsy.  This all started in April.  I certainly know what it feels like to be in "limboland."
Posts.Title: ultrasound breast biopsy yellowrose Beesie
